pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers
Class ComponentEventHandler

java.lang.Object
  pizzaProgram.gui.EventHandlers.ComponentEventHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionListener, EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminGUI_AdminViewEventHandler, CookGUI_CookViewEventHandler, DeliveryGUI_DeliveryViewEventHandler, OrderGUI_OrderViewEventHandler
public abstract class ComponentEventHandler
extends Object
implements ActionListener

An class that manages the event dispatcher and provides a lookup table for Components and what events they produce

Author:
IT1901 Group 3, Fall 2011

Field Summary
private  Module eventDispatchingModule
          A reference to the module that the event handling child class belongs to, so that it can dispatch events
private  Hashtable<Component,String> eventTypeTable
          A HashTable for linking swing Components to a String representing the event they represent, so that the child class can determine what event handling function to call
 
Constructor Summary
ComponentEventHandler(Module eventDispatchingModule)
          Creates the component event handler class
 
Method Summary
abstract  void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e)
          The event handler for swing components
protected  void dispatchEvent(Event<?> event)
          Dispatches an event to the module event dispatcher
protected  String getEventNameByComponent(Component component)
          Returns the String that has been associated with the the component
protected  void registerEventType(Component eventSourceComponent, String eventName)
          Links a component to a string representing the component, so that it can be used to determine what component produced an event invoked
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

eventTypeTable

private Hashtable<Component,String> eventTypeTable
A HashTable for linking swing Components to a String representing the event they represent, so that the child class can determine what event handling function to call

A reference to the module that the event handling child class belongs to, so that it can dispatch events

Method Detail

registerEventType

protected void registerEventType(Component eventSourceComponent,
                                 String eventName)
Links a component to a string representing the component, so that it can be used to determine what component produced an event invoked

Parameters:
eventSourceComponent - The component that sent the ActionEvent
eventName - The String that should represent the event

getEventNameByComponent

protected String getEventNameByComponent(Component component)
Returns the String that has been associated with the the component

Parameters:
component - The component that has sent out an event
Returns:
The string that represents its event

dispatchEvent

Parameters:
event - The event to be sent out
